mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.GAPARALLEL (PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, MPSNO, PARTNO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS) values (#{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{machineno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{partno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proctime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{starttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, MPSNO, PARTNO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS from WISDOM.GAPARALLEL
